short_summary: Content and Data Migration Software Solution
description: The department of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for a Content and Data Migration software solution that will support migration from OpenText Content Server, Microsoft SharePoint 2013, 2016, 2019 on premises, network shared drives, and portable storage (hard disk drives) to Microsoft M365 SharePoint online as the core system managing information.
tags: General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**
--------

Content and Data Migration Software Solution

**Tender Reference**
-------------------

SSC-23-00023701:T

**Amendment**
------------

Amendment 1

**Solicitation Number**
----------------------

BPM019471/23701

**Publication Date**
------------------

August 31, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
--------------------------------

October 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

**Contract Details**
-------------------

The contract is for a Content and Data Migration software solution that will support the migration of data from existing systems to Microsoft M365 SharePoint online.

**Contract Duration**
-------------------

The contract duration is for 1 year, with two optional 1-year periods.

**Delivery**
------------

The software solution will be delivered to an ECCC facility within the National Capital Region (NCR) within 10 days of contract award.

**Tender Status**
----------------

The tender is expired.

**GICS Classification**
-----------------------

The Goods and Services Classification (GICS) classification is N7030AG. This relates to software providing office automation, document management, mail, and networking solutions.

**Geographic Region**
----------------------

The contract is open to bidding from participants from across Canada.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For further information regarding this tender, please contact:
Stephen Innes
Shared Services Canada
PVR 180 Kent Street
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1G 4A8
Phone: (343) 598-3677
Email: [stephen.innes@canada.ca](mailto:stephen.innes@canada.ca)

**Required Documents**
-----------------------

Amendment 1 to the original tender document is available for download at [the specified URL](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/...).
Additional required documents can be found on the [SSC website](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca).

**Trade Agreements**
---------------------

The contract is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and other applicable trade agreements. Please refer to the tender document for details. 

Please note that I did not include the french text, you may leave it to the client if needed I reformulated only the original English entry you provided. You can keep it in markdown format if you want.
